set_probleme_1

Class problema_1

  • java.lang.Object
    • set_probleme_1.problema_1

  • public class problema_1
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    Beta v 1.01
    Author:
    Dan Cebotarenco
    This program is made for calculation permutations arrengements and combinations between 2 digits. Program has 2 static variabiles : n and m.
    This are numbers that must be inputed by Object in from java.util.* library.
